result.reason: Application crashes when applying invalid SQL settings because SqlServerPage.SaveSettings triggers a connection attempt via ReinitializeSqlUpdater without exception handling.
result.approach: Wrap the ReinitializeSqlUpdater call in SqlServerPage.SaveSettings with a try-catch block to handle connection errors gracefully and display an error message instead of crashing.

attempts.raw_output:
{
"decision": "implement",
"reason": "Application crashes when applying invalid SQL settings because SqlServerPage.SaveSettings triggers a connection attempt via ReinitializeSqlUpdater without exception handling.",

"approach": "Wrap the ReinitializeSqlUpdater call in SqlServerPage.SaveSettings with a try-catch block to handle connection errors gracefully and display an error message instead of crashing."
